Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 36th overall pick, by Plum Grove in 1983...
Had first career hit on 6/15/1986, off Randy Folsom (SHP)...
Earned first career win on 6/15/1986...
Traded from Plum Grove to Pontiac on 7/30/1988 (Going to PG: RF A. Sinclair, P J. Morello. Going to PON: P W. Stevens)...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
